solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public void rotate(int[][] matrix) {--newline--        for(int i = 0; i<matrix.length; i++){--newline--            for(int j = i; j<matrix[0].length; j++){--newline--                int temp = 0;--newline--                temp = matrix[i][j];--newline--                matrix[i][j] = matrix[j][i];--newline--                matrix[j][i] = temp;--newline--            }--newline--        }--newline--        for(int i =0 ; i<matrix.length; i++){--newline--            for(int j = 0; j<matrix.length/2; j++){--newline--                int temp = 0;--newline--                temp = matrix[i][j];--newline--                matrix[i][j] = matrix[i][matrix.length-1-j];--newline--                matrix[i][matrix.length-1-j] = temp;--newline--            }--newline--        }--newline--    }--newline--}
